import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";// Material Dashboard 2 React helper functions
import rgba from"assets/theme/functions/rgba";import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var dark=colors.dark,transparent=colors.transparent,white=colors.white;var divider={styleOverrides:{root:{backgroundColor:transparent.main,backgroundImage:"linear-gradient(to right, ".concat(rgba(dark.main,0),", ").concat(rgba(dark.main,0.4),", ").concat(rgba(dark.main,0),") !important"),height:pxToRem(1),margin:"".concat(pxToRem(16)," 0"),borderBottom:"none",opacity:0.25},vertical:{backgroundColor:transparent.main,backgroundImage:"linear-gradient(to bottom, ".concat(rgba(dark.main,0),", ").concat(rgba(dark.main,0.4),", ").concat(rgba(dark.main,0),") !important"),width:pxToRem(1),height:"100%",margin:"0 ".concat(pxToRem(16)),borderRight:"none"},light:{backgroundColor:transparent.main,backgroundImage:"linear-gradient(to right, ".concat(rgba(white.main,0),", ").concat(white.main,", ").concat(rgba(white.main,0),") !important"),"&.MuiDivider-vertical":{backgroundImage:"linear-gradient(to bottom, ".concat(rgba(white.main,0),", ").concat(white.main,", ").concat(rgba(white.main,0),") !important")}}}};export default divider;
